2.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChordInflicts !e1 Astral damage to the nearest enemy in a 20 yard radius, silencing it for 1 second.
2.name: Dissonance
2.title: Dissonance

4.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSongPlays Elegy that inflicts !e1 damage to all enemies in a 20 yard radius.
Elegy and "Cantata" cannot be performed at the same time.
4.name: Elegy
4.title: Elegy

6.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudeSurrounds you with a protective barrier that damages the attackers for !e1 and absorbs !e2 damage at a 50% chance.
Acoustic Barrier may damage an enemy only once per second and in a 20 yard radius.
6.name: Acoustic_Barrier
6.title: Acoustic Barrier

7.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChordPlays "Dissonance" or "Disharmony" !e1 times in a row.
"Dissonance" and "Disharmony" of this ability cost no energy, select random target instead of the nearest one and do not apply silence effect.
7.name: Solo
7.title: Solo

8.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudePlays a taunting tune.
After !e1 seconds the target rushes to attack you, but is knocked down before reaching you.
The target must be in a 10 yard radius.
8.name: Romance
8.title: Romance

9.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen your receive a hit that would otherwise kill you, your health is increased to !e1% of your maximum health, all negative control effects are dispelled from you, and incoming damage is decreased by 80% for !e2 seconds!e3!e4seconds cooldown.
9.name: Protective_Tune
9.title: Protective Tune

10.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSongHeals all your group members in a 20 yard radius every 4 seconds for !e1 and grants a Nocturne effect to one of your group members.
This effect heals the target for !e2 when their health drops lower than 40%.
The Nocturne effect may not be applied to the same target within 15 seconds after it has been triggered.
10.name: Nocturne
10.title: Nocturne

11.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dYour weapon rushes to the target and inflicts !e1 to !e2 physical damage.
Cooldown of this ability varies randomly from 10 to 30 seconds.
11.name: Flying_Blade
11.title: Flying Blade

12.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChordApplies a Power Chord effect to the nearest enemy in a 20 yard radius at the front.
It deals !e1 Astral damage every 2 seconds and increases damage of "Dissonance" and "Disharmony" by !e2%.
This effect lasts 25 seconds and stacks up to 3 times.
12.name: Power_Chord
12.title: Power Chord

13.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSongApplies a Requiem effect to a random nearby enemy every 2 seconds.
It decreases incoming healing and increases damage of "Elegy" and "Cantata" for 2.
5% per stack.
Requiem effect stacks up to !e1 times and lasts 20 seconds.
13.name: Requiem
13.title: Requiem

14.body:
!lvl !cost !dTeaches you 4 marches: March of Astral Power I, March of Ferocity I, March of Energy Surge I and March of Robust Health I.
March effects from different bards do not stack.
Only one march can be performed at the same time.
All marches cost 50 energy to start performing and have cooldown of 15 seconds.
14.name: Musical_Notation
14.title: Musical Notation

15.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChordYour next "Dissonance", "Disharmony" or "Power Chord" played within 3 seconds will additionally damage all enemies in a 10 yard radius of the target, but their cost will be increased by !e1%.
15.name: Timpani
15.title: Timpani

16.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudeAnimates your weapon for 6 seconds.
The weapon flies to the target and inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage 5 times.
16.name: Dancing_Blade
16.title: Dancing Blade

17.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons a muse for 30 seconds.
The muse is invisible to other characters.
While you are in a 30 yard radius from the muse, you receive an "Inspiration" effect that decreases cast time of most etudes and cooldown time of most abilities by !e1%.
17.name: Muse
17.title: Muse

18.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSongGrants a Ballade effect to your group members chosen randomly in a 20 yard radius every 5 seconds.
This effect blocks one offensive control spell.
You are a priority target for this song.
Ballade effect may only be applied again in !e1 seconds after it fades.
18.name: Ballade
18.title: Ballade

19.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudePlays a frightening tune that forces the target to howl in terror after !e1 seconds.
This howl fears all your enemies in a 10 yard radius for !e2 and stuns the target itself.
19.name: Fugue_in_A_minor
19.title: Fugue in A minor

20.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudePlays a simple tune that may dispel one magical effect from the target.
If such effect is dispelled successfully, you will be healed for !e1
20.name: Overture
20.title: Overture

21.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dChordInflicts !e1 Astral damage to the nearest enemy in a 20 yard radius, silencing it for 1 second.
21.name: Disharmony
21.title: Disharmony

22.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSongPlays Cantata that inflict !e1 damage to all enemies in 20 yard radius.
"Elegy" and Cantata cannot be performed at the same time.
22.name: Cantata
22.title: Cantata

23.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudeAnimates your weapon for 6 seconds.
The weapon flies to the target and inflicts !e1 to !e2 damage 5 times.
23.name: Raving_Blade
23.title: Raving Blade

24.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudePlays a taunting tune.
After !e1 seconds the target rushes to attack you, but is knocked down before reaching you.
While this effect is active, the target is receiving !e2 Shadow damage every 0.
5 seconds.
This damage is significantly increased if the target is moving.
The target must be in a 10 yard radius.
24.name: Serenade
24.title: Serenade

25.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dInstantly restores all class abilities except for Encore and Shadow Duet.
Consumes 5 Tears of Dragon.
Cooldown of the Encore ability is decreased by 50% when using Tears of Dragon of a higher quality.
25.name: Encore
25.title: Encore

26.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSummons your shadowy copy at a specified place for 16 seconds.
A copy will perform all the songs that were played during its summoning.
A copy cannot be selected as a target and attacked.
Consumes 4 Tears of Dragon.
A copy will be summoned for a longer period of time, if Tears of Dragon of a higher quality are used.
26.name: Shadow_Duette
26.title: Shadow Duette

27.body:
!lvl !cost !dSuccessful hits of your "Grand Finale", "Flying Blade" and your racial ability apply a Unison effect to the target that lasts 20 seconds and inflicts 0.
716 physical damage every 2 seconds.
Unison effect stacks up to !e1 time(s).
If a target is healed to full, all Unisons effect are dispelled from it.
27.name: Unison
27.title: Unison

28.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Flying Blade" inflicts !e1% more damage, but !e2% of its damage becomes Astral instead of physical.
28.name: Astral_Blade
28.title: Astral Blade

29.body: !lvl !cost !dYour "Solo"s include !e1 additional application(s) of "Dissonance" or !e2 additional application(s) of "Disharmony".
29.name: Long_Solo
29.title: Long Solo

30.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen your health is higher than 75%, your damage is increased by !e1%.
30.name: Passionate_Performance
30.title: Passionate Performance

31.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases range of your "Dissonance", "Disharmony" and "Power Chord" when they are used with "Timpani" or "Solo" by !e1 yards and decreases energy cost of your chords by !e2%.
31.name: Loud_Timpani
31.title: Loud Timpani

32.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases critical strike chance of your "Dissonance", "Disharmony" and "Power Chord" by !e1%
32.name: Sharp_Chord
32.title: Sharp Chord

33.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudePlays a tune that puts the target to sleep.
For every 2 seconds of playing, the duration of sleep is increased by 8 seconds.
Duration of sleep decreases when the target receives damage.
Does not work on targets at 90% or lower health.
Only one target can be put to sleep at a time.
33.name: Lullaby
33.title: Lullaby

34.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases cooldown time of your "Dancing Blade" and "Raving Blade" abilities by !e1% and their energy cost by !e2%.
34.name: Combat_Tune
34.title: Combat Tune

35.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage you deal by !e1% and decreases your threat by !e2%.
35.name: Second_Fiddle
35.title: Second Fiddle

37.body: !lvl !cost !dAdditional targets of "Dissonance", "Disharmony" and "Power Chord" abilities applied under "Timpani" effect receive !e1% more damage.
37.name: Loud_Chords
37.title: Loud Chords

40.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of "Power Chord" by !e1% and its duration by !e2 sec.
40.name: Octave_Doubling
40.title: Octave Doubling

41.body: !lvl !cost !dYour successful "Dancing Blade" and "Raving Blade" spell casts perform one additional attack for !e1 to !e2 physical damage.
41.name: Grand_Finale
41.title: Grand Finale

42.body:
!lvl !cost !dEvery 2 seconds the songs you perform may grant you a Euphoria effect at a !e1% chance.
This effect lasts for 6 seconds and increases your energy regeneration rate by 10 points per second.
42.name: Exaltation
42.title: Exaltation

43.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your Agility by !e1%.
In addition, your "Protective Tune" is activated at a !e2% higher health.
43.name: Trickster
43.title: Trickster

44.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases your Endurance by !e1%.
In addition, critical damage you receive grants you a Sixth Sense effect that increases healing you receive by !e2% for 10 seconds.
44.name: Sixth_Sense
44.title: Sixth Sense

45.body:
!lvl !cost !dTime between ticks of your "Nocturne" and "Aria" is decreased by !e1%.
Successful heals of your "Nocturne" increase your energy regeneration by 10 per seconds for 6 seconds at a !e2% chance.
45.name: Consonance
45.title: Consonance

46.body:
!lvl !cost !dRhapsody applied to another character grants you a Reverberation effect that increases your maximum health by !e1%.
Reverberation and Primal "Inspiration" effects may not be both active at the same target at the same time.
In addition, it increases your damage by !e2% for each performed song.
46.name: Reverberation
46.title: Reverberation

47.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dGrants you an Invigoration effect for seconds that allows you to sing one additional song for the duration of the current combat.
This ability can be used again in !e1 minutes after the additional song fades.
Time between ticks of the additional song is increased by !e2%.
47.name: Invigoration
47.title: Invigoration

48.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of your "Elegy" and "Cantata" by !e1% against enemies who have at least 10 stacks of the "Requiem" effect.
48.name: Grim_Rhymes
48.title: Grim Rhymes

49.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Elegy" and "Cantata" spells cast on a target at 25% health or lower apply a Funeral March effect on this target.
It lasts for 10 seconds and increases your Astral damage dealt to this target for !e1%
49.name: Funeral_March
49.title: Funeral March

50.body: !lvl !cost !dEvery song you perform increases your armor by !e1%.
50.name: Protective_Overtones
50.title: Protective Overtones

51.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases energy consumption when you perform several songs at once by !e1 per second.
51.name: Temperament
51.title: Temperament

52.body: !lvl !cost !dAllows you to parry incoming attacks at a chance equal to 50% of a standard chance.
52.name: Rock_and_Roll
52.title: Rock and Roll

53.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Protective Tune" consumes !e1% less energy.
In addition, your "Protective Tune" decreases damage you receive from area-of-effect attacks by %.
53.name: Protective_Rhythm
53.title: Protective Rhythm

54.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dSongGrants you an Aria effect every 6 seconds.
This effect adds 9.
98 Shadow damage to your next chord, stacks up to 20 times and lasts 60 seconds.
Consumes one stack of the effect per cast.
54.name: Aria
54.title: Aria

56.body: !lvl !cost !dIn addition to its normal effect, the "Muse" skill increases the energy recovery rate by !e1 per second
56.name: Melpomene
56.title: Melpomene

57.body:
!element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dEtudePlays a tune that grants an Ode effect to the target for 10 minutes.
All enemies attracted by your "Romance" or "Serenade" will attack this target instead of you.
Ode will be dispelled if the target moves 40 yards away from you.
57.name: Ode
57.title: Ode

58.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases damage of "Acoustic Barrier" by !e1%.
In addition, when you are playing etudes, duration of silencing or knocking down effects is decreased by !e2%.
58.name: Perfect_Acoustics
58.title: Perfect Acoustics

59.body:
!lvl !cost !dIncreases healing penalty of "Requiem" !e1%.
Increases your Shadow damage by %.
59.name: Poetry_of_Death
59.title: Poetry of Death

60.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour "Flying Blade" ability and your etudes apply a "Resonance" Point effect to the target for 30 seconds.
This effect increases the range of your chords used against this target to 40 yards.
60.name: Resonance_Point
60.title: Resonance Point

61.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases time between ticks of "Ballade" and "Requiem" by !e1%.
61.name: High_Tempo
61.title: High Tempo

62.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases energy regeneration rate by !e1 per second for 10 seconds when you receive critical damage.
62.name: Adrenaline_Rush
62.title: Adrenaline Rush

64.body: !lvl !cost !dIf an enemy attracted to you by "Romance" or "Serenade" dies within 15 seconds, your "Romance" and "Serenade" cooldowns will reset instantly.
64.name: Frivolity
64.title: Frivolity

65.body: !lvl !cost !dDecreases "Fugue in A minor" cooldown by !e1% and its cast time by !e2%.
65.name: Forbidden_Note
65.title: Forbidden Note

66.body: !lvl !cost !dWhen the "Requiem" effect is active, your Rage is increased by !e1%, and enemy's Willpower is decreased by !e2%.
66.name: Requiem_for_Enemies
66.title: Requiem for Enemies

67.body: !element !lvl !cost !range !energy !time !cooldawn !preparation !dWhile this tune is active, the target is invisible to everyone except the caster.
67.name: Dancing_Shadows
67.title: Dancing Shadows

68.body:
!lvl !cost !dYour successful "Overture" slows the target down by 50% for !e1 seconds.
In addition, your Shadow damage is increased by !e2%.
68.name: Menacing_Tune
68.title: Menacing Tune

69.body: !lvl !cost !dEach time your "Overture" successfully dispels a magical effect, your energy regeneration rate increases by 10 per second for 6 seconds.
69.name: Inspiration
69.title: Inspiration

70.body:
!lvl !cost !dGrants you an Improvisation ability.
When your "Ballade" effect blocks an offensive control ability, you receive a New Idea effect that lasts 60 seconds and can be stacked up to 4 times.
Improvisation spends all stacks of the New Idea effect, inflicting 9.
6 Shadow damage and stunning the enemy by !e1 second per stack.
70.name: New_Idea
70.title: New Idea

72.body: !lvl !cost !dIncreases your damage to stunned, blinded, feared, knocked down or slowed enemies by !e1%.
72.name: Punishment_for_Weakness
72.title: Punishment for Weakness
